alert.note: Alert for Adams; Buffalo; Clay; Fillmore; Greeley; Hall; Hamilton; Howard; Kearney; Merrick; Nance; Nuckolls; Polk; Sherman; Thayer; Valley; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 07 at 3:56AM CDT until April 08 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Very strong winds and marginal relative humidity values will continue across the local area today. Critical relative humidity values along with breezy northwest winds are expected Friday... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 039, 040, 041, 046, 047, 048, 049, 061, 062, 063, 064, 074, 075, 076, 077, 086 AND 087... The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a Fire Weather Watch for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Friday afternoon through Friday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...In Nebraska, Fire Weather Zone 039 Valley, Fire Weather Zone 040 Greeley, Fire Weather Zone 041 Nance, Fire Weather Zone 046 Sherman, Fire Weather Zone 047 Howard, Fire Weather Zone 048 Merrick, Fire Weather Zone 049 Polk, Fire Weather Zone 061 Buffalo, Fire Weather Zone 062 Hall, Fire Weather Zone 063 Hamilton, Fire Weather Zone 064 York, Fire Weather Zone 074 Kearney, Fire Weather Zone 075 Adams, Fire Weather Zone 076 Clay, Fire Weather Zone 077 Fillmore, Fire Weather Zone 086 Nuckolls and Fire Weather Zone 087 Thayer. * WINDS...North northwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * TIMING...From Noon through 9 PM CDT Friday. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 12 to 17 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that ignite may spread rapidly and exhibit extreme fire behavior. Use extreme caution if engaging in activities that could result in fire ignition.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are possible. Listen for updated forecasts and the possible issuance of Red Flag Warnings.
